description: I was sitting in my car driving to a shopping center when I noticed a guy waiting at a bus stop next to the highway. I stopped at the nearby parking place and started to check him out. He was from Russia and had a very sexy dialect. He came to Prague to study economics when he was eighteen. I must admit I was surprised. I tried to talk him into my dirty game step by step but he was not greedy like most of the other boys I meet every day. It took me quite some time to explain him that I am only recording for my personal fun. But then after I managed that he showed me his dick everything went smoother than expected. He saw that he could trust me and slowly but surely he started to appreciate the amounts I was offering. The nearby cornfield was ours :-)
title: Czech Hunter 204
